properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM,S.* FROM (SELECT FEED_NO ,FEED_TITLE ,MEMBER_ID ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM FEED F JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) S) WHERE "ROWNUM" BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FEED WHERE STATUS='Y'
UPDATE FEED SET COUNT = COUNT +1 WHERE FEED_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT FEED_NO ,FEED_TITLE ,FEED_CONTENT ,CATEGORY_NAME ,MEMBER_ID ,MARATHON_NAME ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM FEED F JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN MARATHON_INFO ON(MARATHON_NO = COMPETITION_NO) WHERE FEED_NO = ? AND F.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REPLY_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT ,MEMBER_ID ,CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ?
